title: Calculator for Android Wear
summary: The best calculator for Android Wear.
description: The best calculator for Android Wear.Simple and practical design for both round and square smart watches.It is a handy tool for everyday use.Install the app from Play Store and then go to "Start..." on your smart watch where you can find the calculator.Please help us make it better with your suggestions.
descriptionHTML:
The best calculator for Android Wear.


Simple and practical design for both round and square smart watches.
It is a handy tool for everyday use.


Install the app from Play Store and then go to "Start..." on your smart watch where you can find the calculator.




Please help us make it better with your suggestions.
comments: Good calculator Unable to locate the clear button to empty screen. Otherwise would have given 5 star. Adding a percentage key will also be good.
seems ok but... plus button didn't work on my moto 360 sport in round mode :-\ all others did
It doesnt work I downloaded this app but it never installed on the watch
Uninstall Not so good. Tried to uninstall and the app is too stubborn, have to factory reset the watch.
Stable, smooth, nice UI Have absolutely no complaints. A must have app for wear.
Great! This is simple and clean app that looks attractive on the Moto 360 2nd Gen watch. Best of all, no permissions required. :)
